channel.title: Download on TAPAAL
channel.description: Recent content in Download on TAPAAL

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog 4.0.1 (2025-08-07): Minor fixes in TAPAAL GUI (opening files, redu/undo, generation of place tranistion/names and fixes to version check) 4.0.0 (2025-06-25): Support for colored net editing, verification and unfolding/simulation Support for stochastic timed-arc Petri nets and statistical model checking (SMC) Support for verification of LTL and HyperLTL queries New search feature for locating places/transitions by their names, also in the query dialog Redisigned batch processing dialog and support for passing engine options directly in the command line Numerous GUI improvements (e.

item.title: Older releases
item.description: Older releases TAPAAL 4.0.1 for Windows Download (64 bit) TAPAAL 4.0.1 for Linux Download (64 bit) TAPAAL 4.0.1 for Intel Mac Download (64 bit) TAPAAL 4.0.1 for Arm Mac Download (64 bit) TAPAAL 4.0.0 for Windows Download (64 bit) TAPAAL 4.0.0 for Linux Download (64 bit) TAPAAL 4.0.0 for Intel Mac Download (64 bit) TAPAAL 4.0.0 for Arm Mac Download (64 bit) TAPAAL 3.
